Font characteristics.Color: 'Killing' in red; rest of main phrase in black; '4M+ VIEWS' in white on a black bar; 'Dr.Pal' in black, 'Traya.' in white

Large view count badge as social proof

THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Visual reinforcement of the title: The thumbnail's warning message ('Your Gut is Killing You') visually echoes the video's promise to fix gut bacteria and solve digestive problems. The presence of a gut illustration and an expert (Dr.Pal) directly supports the title's promise of expertise.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Contrasts or mismatches: The thumbnail emphasizes urgency and danger ('Killing You'), while the title adds hope and a solution ('How to FIX Your Gut Bacteria FAST & Solve All The Digestive Issues!!'). The thumbnail is more problem-focused; the title is more solution-focused, together creating a powerful hook.
